name: The Hook
effect: Discards 2 random cards per hand played

name: The Ox
effect: Playing a hand with 0 #[Spade, Heart, Club, Diamond] sets money to $0

name: The House
effect: First hand is drawn face down

name: The Wall
effect: Extra large blind

name: The Wheel
effect: 1 in 7 cards get drawn face down

name: The Arm
effect: Decrease level of played poker hand

name: The Club
effect: All Clubs are debuffed

name: The Fish
effect: Cards drawn face down after each hand played

name: The Psychic
effect: Must play 5 cards

name: The Goad
effect: All Spades are debuffed

name: The Water
effect: Start with 0 discards

name: The Window
effect: All Diamonds are debuffed

name: The Manacle
effect: -1 hand size

name: The Eye
effect: No repeat hand types this round

name: The Mouth
effect: Play only 1 hand type this round

name: The Plant
effect: All face cards are debuffed

name: The Serpent
effect: After Play or Discard, always draw 3 cards

name: The Pillar
effect: Cards played previously this Ante are debuffed

name: The Needle
effect: Play only 1 hand

name: The Head
effect: All Hearts are debuffed

name: The Tooth
effect: Lose $1 per card played

name: The Flint
effect: Base Chips and Mult are halved

name: The Mark
effect: All face cards are drawn face down

name: Amber Acorn
effect: Flips and shuffles all Joker cards

name: Verdant Leaf
effect: All cards are debuffed until 1 Joker sold

name: Violet Vessel
effect: Very large blind

name: Crimson Heart
effect: One random Joker is debuffed every hand

name: Cerulean Bell
effect: Forces 1 card to always be selected
